## SummonerSpellManager class

A spell manager - to fetch and manage all summoner spell data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SummonerSpellManager implements BaseManager<SummonerSpell> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[SummonerSpell](./shieldbow.summonerspell.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.summonerspellmanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [SummonerSpell](./shieldbow.summonerspell.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of the summoner spells cached in the memory. |
|  [client](./shieldbow.summonerspellmanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager belongs to. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(key, options)](./shieldbow.summonerspellmanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetch a spell by its ID. The ID is usually something like Summoner<!-- -->{<!-- -->Spell<!-- -->} For example, for the spell <code>Flash</code>, the ID is <code>SummonerFlash</code>. But there are a lot of exceptions to this, so it is recommended to use  instead. |
|  [findByName(name)](./shieldbow.summonerspellmanager.findbyname.md) |  | Find a spell by its name. The search is case-insensitive. The special characters are NOT ignored. |
